titleStmt.title: The lives and deaths of the holy apostles of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ together with the two evangelists St. Mark and St. Luke : as also, some other of our Saviours disciples containing an account of their travels, sayings, miracles, sufferings and martyrdoms / all collected from the best authors for public use and benefit.
titleStmt.author: P. D.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
